title: You Are Already Dead
body:
You Are Already Dead

Anastasia was looking in front of her without blinking her eyes.

In front of her, a giant black throne was emitting a black aura which was giving a dreadful pressure.

It was the core of the shadow realm 'THE THRONE OF ABSOLUTE SHADOW!'

An energy flow was coming out from the throne, and was going outside from the shadow realm, disappearing into void afterwards.

It is been ten days since the energy flow started to come out from the throne, and the connection between the throne and the shadow monarch core started to form.

She was equally confused as Baphomet because of this strange situation.

She was not confused because of the connection, because she already knew this will happened sooner or later.

When she felt the usage of shadow energy some time ago, she already knew this will happen in the future.

The reason for her confusion was the fact that the connection was forming very slowly.
